name: Cartoon Rage
description:
Cartoon Rage is an adventure cooperative game focused on solving 2D platform puzzles with friends! Avoid obstacles and progress to your ship!

  • Multiple gameplay: from 2D platform to other POVs, you have to plan accordingly
  • 5 major sections to complete with up to 8 players!
  • Shared progress: if another player is the host, your own account gets the progress too!
